attributes.action: Ban all new nuclear power stations and instead invest money in wind power and solar energy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nuclear power is not cheap it costs huge sums of money to decommission a power station and there is no safe way to store the waste generated. The government should instead invest money into renewable energy.
Solar power could easily cover all of our energy needs if every building in the country had solar panels installed.
The government should introduce tax breaks and subsidies for consumers and businesses who install wind generators and solar panels.
